readable.title: 1295698260_e10c53c137
readable.content: A crowd of people look at something out of frame , one man takes a picture . A group of people stop to look at something while one takes a picture . A woman with a shopping bag labeled " sale " stands in a crowd next to a young man with a camera . The man is taking a picture while the crowd gathers . The woman in glasses is holding a red and white sale bag .
